parameters.name: UseGaugeTable
parameters.description: True to use a gauge table, false to not

parameters.name: GaugeTableFile
parameters.description: Gauge table file name; valid only if UseGaugeTable is true

title: ISheetMetalFeatureData.SetUseGaugeTable
description: Sets whether to use a sheet metal feature gauge table.
signature:
System.Int32 SetUseGaugeTable( 
   System.Boolean
UseGaugeTable
,
   System.String
GaugeTableFile
)

parameters.name: UseGaugeTable
parameters.description: True to use a gauge table, false to not

parameters.name: GaugeTableFile
parameters.description: Gauge table file name; valid only if UseGaugeTable is true

returns: Result code as defined in swSheetMetalModifierError_e
